Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: the pubkeys array is in komodod only now ...

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: that can be updated in advance .. but iguana has nothing to allow timestamp activation or blockheigh activation

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: it requires every node to restart at the same time

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: so I put `staked.json` inside komodod and bash script fetches it on each start, and compares with old verison.... if its diffrent it will kill iguana and restart it

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: so just a cron of start.sh every hour or 15mins or something *should* work for this... OR to manually do it,  update to the correct komodod, then set cron to activate iguana restart just after era has changed (when inside gap)
